net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_setSaveEffectMultiplier
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Sets a value, generally between 0 and 1 inclusively, to apply against damage from a Save Damage roll. For the following values, setSaveEffectDescription will also be called with a corresponding description:
0: "No Damage" 0.5: "Half Damage"
For all other values, call setEffectDescription with an appropriate description.
